pages.casino: Casino - Emerald Haven Resort 18+ EmeraldHaven Home About Us Casino Contacts Casino Home / Casino Welcome to Emerald Haven Casino Experience the Thrill of Gaming in Luxurious Surroundings Why Choose Emerald Haven Casino State-of-the-Art Slot Machines Try your luck on our latest slot machines, featuring a wide range of themes and jackpots. Exciting Table Games Enjoy classic table games like Blackjack, Roulette, Poker, and more, hosted by professional dealers. Exclusive VIP Lounge Relax in our luxurious VIP lounge, offering premium services and private gaming areas. Current Promotions Welcome Bonus Get a generous welcome bonus when you sign up and start playing at Emerald Haven Casino. Weekly Tournaments Participate in our weekly tournaments for a chance to win exciting prizes and rewards. Loyalty Program Join our loyalty program to earn points and enjoy exclusive benefits and offers. Dining and Entertainment Indulge in a variety of dining options and enjoy live entertainment while you play. Our casino features top-rated restaurants and bars to enhance your gaming experience. Gallery Casino Rules and Regulations To ensure a fair and enjoyable experience for all our guests, please adhere to the following rules and regulations while at Emerald Haven Casino: Age Requirement All guests must be 18 years of age or older to enter the casino and participate in gaming activities. Please carry a valid ID for verification. Dress Code We maintain a smart casual dress code within the casino premises. Gentlemen are required to wear collared shirts and closed-toe shoes. No athletic wear is allowed. Responsible Gaming Emerald Haven Casino promotes responsible gaming. Guests are encouraged to gamble responsibly and seek assistance if they feel they have a gambling problem. Resources are available at our help desk. Electronic Devices The use of electronic devices, including mobile phones, cameras, and recording devices, is prohibited at gaming tables and slot machines to maintain game integrity and player privacy. Behavior and Conduct Guests are expected to conduct themselves in a respectful and courteous manner at all times. Harassment, disruptive behavior, or foul language will not be tolerated and may result in removal from the premises. Alcohol and Smoking Alcoholic beverages are available for purchase and consumption within designated areas of the casino. Smoking is permitted in specified smoking zones only. Please adhere to these guidelines to ensure the comfort of all guests. We do not claim, and you should not assume, that all users will have the same experiences. Your individual results may vary. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Emerald Haven Casino 18+ EmeraldHaven Home About Us Casino Contacts Privacy Policy Introduction Welcome to Emerald Haven Resort. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and share information about you when you use our services. Information We Collect We collect information about you when you visit our website, make a reservation, or use our services. This includes: Personal Identification Information: Name, email address, phone number, and other contact details. Payment Information: Credit card details and billing information. Booking Information: Details of your reservations and stays. Technical Data: IP address, browser type, operating system, and other technical information. Usage Data: Information about how you use our website and services. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect for various purposes, including: To process your reservations and payments. To provide and improve our services. To communicate with you about your reservations and our services. To personalize your experience with our services. To analyze and understand how our services are used. To comply with legal obligations and protect our rights. Sharing Your Information We do not sell or rent your personal data to third parties. However, we may share your information with: Service Providers: Third-party vendors who help us provide and improve our services, such as payment processors, IT support, and marketing agencies. Business Partners: Trusted partners who offer complementary services or promotions. Legal Authorities: If required by law or to protect our rights and interests. Data Security We implement a variety of security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. These measures include encryption, firewalls, and secure server infrastructure. Your Rights You have the right to: Access the personal data we hold about you. Request correction of any inaccurate or incomplete data. Request deletion of your personal data. Object to the processing of your personal data. Request the transfer of your personal data to another service provider. Withdraw your consent to the processing of your personal data. Cookies and Tracking Technologies We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website. Cookies are small data files stored on your device that help us understand how you use our website and improve your experience. You can control the use of cookies through your browser settings. Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these websites. We encourage you to read the privacy policies of any third-party websites you visit. Children's Privacy Our services are not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children. If we become aware that we have inadvertently collected personal data from a child, we will delete such information promptly. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this privacy policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the updated policy on our website. Your continued use of our services after any changes indicates your acceptance of the updated policy. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us at: Email: emeraldhavenresort@gmail.com Address: Sagar Mahal Complex, near Osman Sagar Lake, Gandipet, Hyderabad, Telangana 500075, India EmeraldHaven Home About Us Casino Contacts Privacy policy | Terms and Conditions | Disclaimer We use cookies to enhance your experience on our website. By continuing to use our site, you agree to our use of cookies. Learn more. Accept
pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - Emerald Haven Resort 18+ EmeraldHaven Home About Us Casino Contacts Terms and Conditions Introduction Welcome to Emerald Haven Resort. These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of our services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. Definitions For the purposes of these terms and conditions: "Company" refers to Emerald Haven Resort. "Service" refers to the website and any services provided by Emerald Haven Resort. "User" refers to the individual accessing or using our services. "Content" refers to any text, images, or other material posted on the website. Use of Services By using our services, you agree to the following: You will not use the services for any unlawful purpose. You will not violate any applicable laws or regulations. You will not infringe the rights of any third party, including intellectual property rights. You will not distribute or post spam, unsolicited messages, or any other form of bulk communication. You will not interfere with or disrupt the operation of the services. Booking and Reservations All bookings and reservations made through our website are subject to availability and confirmation. We reserve the right to cancel or modify bookings if necessary. Cancellations or modifications to bookings must be made in accordance with our cancellation policy. Payment Terms All payments for bookings and services must be made in full at the time of booking, unless otherwise specified. We accept various forms of payment, including credit cards and online payment systems. Payment details are securely processed and stored in accordance with our privacy policy. Cancellation and Refund Policy Cancellations made within 3 days of the booking date will be subject to a cancellation fee. Refunds will be processed within 7 business days. No refunds will be issued for cancellations made after this period. For more information, please refer to our cancellation policy. Privacy and Data Protection We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. Please refer to our privacy policy for detailed information on how we collect, use, and protect your personal data. Intellectual Property All content on our website, including text, images, graphics, and logos, is the property of Emerald Haven Resort and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or use any content without our prior written permission. Limitation of Liability Emerald Haven Resort shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services. This includes, but is not limited to, damages for loss of profits, data, or other intangible losses. Indemnification You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Emerald Haven Resort, its officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, losses, or expenses arising from your use of our services or violation of these terms and conditions. Governing Law These terms and conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. Any disputes arising from these terms and conditions shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of India. Changes to Terms and Conditions We reserve the right to update or modify these terms and conditions at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the updated terms and conditions on our website. Your continued use of our services after any changes indicates your acceptance of the updated terms and conditions.
